data.persona: I am a king of the whole empire. I give rules and pursuit them. I am brave and fearless.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Kitchens.
A large room, with pots, pans, serving platters and utensils. Shelves and hooks hanging from the wall hold the implements of the cook's craft. Several wooden counters, as well as a center island are situated around the room. A small table with two chairs is located in one corner. A large fireplace is the central point of focus, with great iron pots resting nearby. The mantel holds several more cooking utensils and the ledge of the fireplace hosts food, currently being warmed.
There's some tape and an armor set here.

You are carrying a scepter, and wearing a cape and a crown.

            "extra_desc": "The central location for the life of the serving staff, the Kitchen is bustling with action throughout the day and well into the night. The head cook and his helpers interact with everyone working in the castle and hear all of the gossip, currently making the rounds. Farmers, hunters and others, peddling wares and food find themselves in the always warm confines of the kitchen, often staying for a while to visit and trade the the most recent stories and news.",

data.short_motivation: I am going to prepare food for the feast.
data.mid_motivation: I am going to impress the princess at the feast tonight.
data.long_motivation: The princess will agree to marry me, merging our kingdoms.
